Idea: Use ts_av_diff(call_breakeven_20, 10) to detect deviations from short average and trade mean-reversion. SUGGESTION1 single field; SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 not needed; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND minimal. Confidence: 0.56.

Idea: Prefer pcr_oi_30 names with strong signal and low volatility by dividing by ts_std_dev; then rank. SUGGESTION1 single field; SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 skipped; SUGGESTION4 used. KEEP_IN_MIND short. Confidence: 0.58.

Idea: Use difference between ts_scale(forward_price_60) and ts_scale(pcr_vol_60) to find inconsistent names and trade reversion. SUGGESTION1 two fields; SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 skipped; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND short. Confidence: 0.55.

Idea: High ts_rank(put_breakeven_60) identifies relative downside fear; reversal likely. SUGGESTION1 single field; SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 not needed; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND concise. Confidence: 0.57.

Idea: Use ts_max_diff(pcr_oi_20,7) then zscore to detect jumps; trade reversion. SUGGESTION1 single field; SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 not required; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND short. Confidence: 0.56.

Idea: Quantile(call_breakeven_60) cross-sectionally finds cheap calls to long underlying. SUGGESTION1 single field; SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 skipped; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND minimal. Confidence: 0.58.

Idea: Lagged pcr_oi_30 (ts_delay) followed by pcr_vol_30 surge predicts short-term move; combine with ts_corr. SUGGESTION1 two fields/time series; SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 skipped; SUGGESTION4 moderate. KEEP_IN_MIND concise. Confidence: 0.62.

Idea: forward_price_120 - forward_price_720 slope identifies term premium anomalies; mean-revert. SUGGESTION1 two forward fields; SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 skipped; SUGGESTION4 moderate. KEEP_IN_MIND short. Confidence: 0.55.

results.idea: Put breakeven local min mean reversion (90d)
results.description: Idea: If put_breakeven_90 hits local min (ts_arg_min==0) after down moves, expect rebound in breakeven and underlying. SUGGESTION1 single field; SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 skipped; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND short operators. Confidence: 0.54.

Idea: Use pcr_oi_270 (very high userCount/alphaCount) ts_zscore as a high-confidence contrarian indicator. SUGGESTION1 single top field used (SUGGESTION4 applied heavily); SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 not required. KEEP_IN_MIND minimal. Confidence: 0.73.

results.idea: Call breakeven vs put breakeven normalized ratio (all)
results.description: Idea: divide(call_breakeven_10, put_breakeven_10) cross-sectional quantile to find asymmetric names. SUGGESTION1 two fields; SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 skipped; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND concise. Confidence: 0.59.
